hypothesis: B1 holds at N=572 with tight margin (<3pp from falsification threshold)
method: Three-criterion test: (1) git storage recovery on sample lessons, (2) INDEX.md theme bucket coverage vs 20% miss threshold, (3) semantic retrieval gap by L-number findability
conclusion: Storage scales indefinitely. Retrieval degrades linearly at 0.038pp/lesson. B1 needs splitting: B1a (storage, confirmed) vs B1b (retrieval, falsified). Immediate fix: INDEX.md theme backfill of ~15 lessons. Structural fix: F-QC4 theme-at-write-time enforcement.
diff_from_expect: Expected B1 to hold with tight margin. It didn't â€” 2.4pp past threshold. Prediction correct on storage, wrong on retrieval. Degradation rate (0.038pp/L) was not predicted.
